text: @SouthernOracle4 It's not like, you know, if you'd like to come quietly now.

passages.full_quote: "<used>It's not like, you know, a</used> massed attack."
"If ever you want a few days off, <used>you know, if you'd like</used> a holiday-" MANY THANKS FOR THE OFFER, said Death graciously
Though <used>if you'd like to</used> dive into the water first I won't stop you.
And although I imagine you must be very tired, I expect <used>you'd like to come</used> along for the ride
I think they'<used>d like to come quietly now</used>.
